page.title: 10Leicester is a place to play
page.content: We play many different games, some{ {competitive,}like football, netball, basketball, cricket, and rounders, but others, like skipping, crocodile, polo, double-ball, stuck-in-the-mud, and British bulldog are{just for fun. The fun games are usually played in our school playground, but sometimes we play them at home.{Laggy}is played by stretching elastic between two people's legs, and a third person trying to move the elastic with their own feet. The games{crocodile, polo, } and{ice cream}are all played in a similar way. One child stands near a wall facing another group of children who stand in a line about 2 metres away. The idea is to reach the wall without being seen. We also play many{ {chasing games,}like{kiss-chase, {stuck-in-the-mud,}and{British bulldog.
